com.facebook.buck.android

Interface HasAndroidResourceDeps

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasBuildTarget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidResource

    public interface HasAndroidResourceDeps
extends HasBuildTarget
    Indicates that this class may have android resources that should be packaged into an APK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<Iterable<HasAndroidResourceDeps>,Sha1HashCode> ABI_HASHER 

      • Fields inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.model.HasBuildTarget

        BUILD_TARGET_COMPARATOR, TO_TARGET

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Path getAssets() 
      Collection<Path> getInputsToCompareToOutput()
      See Buildable.getInputsToCompareToOutput() This is used by buildables that need to be rebuilt if any of the inputs of the android resource rules that they depend on change.
      Path getPathToTextSymbolsFile()

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.model.HasBuildTarget

        getBuildTarget

    • Field Detail

      • ABI_HASHER

        static final Function<Iterable<HasAndroidResourceDeps>,Sha1HashCode> ABI_HASHER

    • Method Detail

      • getRDotJavaPackage

        String getRDotJavaPackage()
        Returns:
        the package name in which to generate the R.java representing these resources.

      • getPathToTextSymbolsFile

        Path getPathToTextSymbolsFile()
        Returns:
        path to a temporary directory for storing text symbols.

      • getTextSymbolsAbiKey

        Sha1HashCode getTextSymbolsAbiKey()
        Returns:
        an ABI for the file pointed by getPathToTextSymbolsFile(). Since the symbols text file is essentially a list of resource id, name and type, this is simply a sha1 of that file.

      • getRes

        @Nullable
Path getRes()
        Returns:
        path to a directory containing Android resources.

      • getAssets

        @Nullable
Path getAssets()
        Returns:
        path to a directory containing Android assets.

      • getInputsToCompareToOutput

        Collection<Path> getInputsToCompareToOutput()
        See Buildable.getInputsToCompareToOutput() This is used by buildables that need to be rebuilt if any of the inputs of the android resource rules that they depend on change. This allows the buildables to avoid waiting for this rule to finish.

      • hasWhitelistedStrings

        boolean hasWhitelistedStrings()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether this resource rule has whitelisted strings.
